name: CAKE Communication
tagline: Deliver the right message, right time, right place
description:
We develop well-thought-out strategies and lead the integrated management of them. Our method is simple: deliver the right message, at the right time, in the right place, with a concern for return on your investment.
We offer services combining strategy, design and multimedia, all realized by a multidisciplinary team.
Our clients are involved in every step of the process to the final design.
